original_text: All that were numbered of the Levites, which Moses and Aaron numbered at the commandment of the Lord, throughout their families, all the males from a month old and upward, were twenty and two thousand.
korean_text: 모세와 아론이 여호와의 명령을 따라 레위인을 각 종족대로 계수한즉 일 개월 이상 된 남자는 모두 이만 이천 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: All that were numbered of the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 지파 중에 계수된 모든 사람들은

sentences.original_text: at the commandment of the Lord
all the males from a month old and upward
sentences.korean_translation: 한 달 이상 된 모든 남자들은
